==Trivia==
{{NorseMyth|("the Shelf of the Slain") is one of Odin's Halls, a great dwelling built and roofed with pure silver. In this room is a high seat, [[Wikipedia:Hliðskjálf|Hliðskjálf]], where Odin can watch over the entire universe. To put it simply, it is Odin's throne room.}}
** In the context of {{FE|H}} this corresponds with {{St|Hliðskjálf}}, the staff used by {{Ut|Veronica: Brave Princess}}.
